successes.title: SensorWake - Wake Up Happy with the Smell-Based Alarm Clock
successes.description: The world's first olfactory alarm clock, invented to make your mornings happy thanks to your favorite scent!

Pledges.description: SENSORWAKE FAN: Your donation helps get us started. Thank you so much! Send us a selfie of you and it will be featured in the "Hall Of Framed" section on our website!
SENSORWAKE T-SHIRT: Thank you for supporting us! You get et a funny "Waking Up Happiness" T-shirt to share our common vision of happy mornings.

SENSORWAKE EARLY BIRD: Get one SensorWake ready to wake you up + one two-capsule pack of your choice! 
Be the first to revolutionize your morning and save 45€ ($50) off the retail price!

SENSORWAKE CLASSIC: Get one SensorWake ready to wake you up + one two-capsule pack of your choice! 
Be the first to revolutionize your morning and save 28€ ($30) off the retail price!

SENSORWAKE More Capsules: Get one SensorWake ready to wake you up + TWO two-capsule packs of your choice! 
Be the first to revolutionize your morning with double the choices of scent and save 30€ ($33) off the retail price!

SENSORWAKE DUO: Get TWO SensorWake devices + TWO two-capsule packs of your choice! 
Let you and a loved one together be the first to revolutionize your mornings. Expected to be shipped in time for the winter holidays and save 98€ ($107) off the retail price!

SENSORWAKE FAMILY: Get FOUR SensorWake devices ready to wake you up + FOUR two-capsule packs of your choice! 
Let the whole family be the first to revolutionize their mornings and save 135€ ($147) off the retail price!
SENSORWAKE CREATOR: If you want to introduce SensorWake locally and be part of our success, here is your chance! Contact us at plus@sensorwake.com for more information.
